record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - May 13, 2008)

[Page: S4121]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consented that it stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 6:39 p.m., adjourned until Wednesday, May 14, 2008, at 9:30 a.m.
